Description: Mould-made pottery lamp decorated on the discus with Osiris-Canopus, flanked by a star and a crescent moon. The shoulder is plain except for three studs near the nozzle and a stud on each side of the handle. At the rear is a ring handle. The lamp stands on a base-ring. Covered with a mottled brown slip.
Bibliographic references: Lamp / Catalogue of the Lamps in the British Museum (Q2042.bis)
